isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - AIR COMPRESSOR GOVERNOR (TYPE D-2) - INSTALL

svcproc.title: INSTALL
svcproc.para: If compressor-mounted type governor, clean mounting pad on both compressor and governor block. Clean connecting line or lines. Also be sure compressor unloader port is clear and clean.

If the governor is being mounted remotely, it should be positioned so that its exhaust port points down. It should be mounted higher than the compressor so that its connecting lines will drain away from the governor.

step1.para: If compressor-mounted type, use a new governor mounting gasket. Install governor and mounting bolts. Tighten bolts.

Connect air lines to governor. Test governor as outlined under
SERVICE CHECKS
.
After the adjustment is made, be sure the governor cover is securely installed.
